miring-result.description: The node reporting-center is missing a reporting-center-context attribute.
miring-result.solution: Please add a reporting-center-context attribute to the reporting-center node.

miring-result.description: There is a missing raw-reads node underneath the typing-method node.
miring-result.solution: Please add one raw-reads node underneath the typing-method node. Every sbt-ngs node must have at least one child raw-reads node.

miring-result.description: The end attribute on a consensus-sequence-block node should be less than or equal to the end attribute on the corresponding reference-sequence node.
miring-result.solution: Verify that the consensus-sequence-block:start is greater than or equal to start, and consensus-sequence-block:end is less than or equal to end on the corresponding reference-sequence.

miring-result.description: The node reference-sequence is missing a accession attribute.
miring-result.solution: Please add a accession attribute to the reference-sequence node. accession and uri attributes are expected for unambiguous identification of the publicly hosted reference sequence. Include them if they are available.

miring-result.description: The hmlid root is formatted like an OID.
miring-result.solution: No solution needed. This is a good thing.

miring-result.description: On a sbt-ngs node, test-id is not formatted like a GTR test ID.
miring-result.solution: Other test formats are allowed. It isn't necessary to only use a GTR test ID: GTR000000000.0
